newsitem.title: HUNGARY: Hungary 1-mo BUBOR rate 23.43 pct, 3-mo 23.42 pct.
newsitem.headline: Hungary 1-mo BUBOR rate 23.43 pct, 3-mo 23.42 pct.

text.p: Hungary's Budapest Interbank Offered Rate (BUBOR) dropped by 0.06 percentage point for the one-month maturity and by 0.03 percentage point for three months, the National Bank of Hungary (NBH) said on Monday.
The BUBOR was fixed by the NBH at 23.43 percent for the one month and 23.42 for the three month maturity.
The NBH began calculating BUBOR on August 1.
